description.full_text:
Product
2 Large Tile and Plank : ideal for realistic layout and design flexibility
Ultra-Natural shades: closely resemble raw materials for authentic aesthetics
Durable construction: designed for high-traffic environments
Complete decorative solution: compatible with GTI Max, includes entrance mats, ramps, and junctions
Slip-resistant & easy to clean: ensures safety and maintenance ease
Rolling trolley noise reduction (vs ceramic): quieter commercial use
 Installation
Strong MegaClic connection: reinforced vertical clic system for robust, adhesive-free installation
Can be installed directly over ceramic
Quick renovation solution: no glue required
 Application
High-traffic areas: ideal for retail, education, public buildings
Create zones: design themed atmospheres for dedicated spaces (e.g., supermarket corners)
Mix & Match: harmonizes with GTI Max for custom layouts
 Environment
Made in Europe
Eco-responsible: 100% reciklabilno and includes recycled content
Better indoor air quality: low TVOC (<10 µg /m3), phthalate-free
